name: Can you see me?
description:
I can see you.

And so can she.

•—×—×—•

Warning:
This game is NOT suitable for children or those who suffer from depression or anxiety. Please only play if you are over the age of 13 and not suffering these (or similar) mental illnesses.

•—×—×—•

Hey there. I can see you.
You'lL see me soon, don't worry.
I'm here to help, and I'll try and be As supportive as I can!
Don't worry, I'm your fRiend!
All I want is to be your friend, but there's someone here.
She can hear us, but don't fret.
She's nice, she helped me.
For once I want to be someone who cAn help others, be Kind and respEctful.
Could you blame someone for that? Y                    E                                                            S

...

Hey, one last question:
Can you see me yet?

•—×—×—•

Version 0.1d, made for testing.
There is not much content and this game is very early in development.
[Demo]
Ren'Py 7.4 was just released and it brought a few bugs - I am aware of these and these cannot be fixed until 7.4.1 is released. I'm sorry.

•—×—×—•

Made by Peachy
